1: I wait patiently and find joy in being heard.
2: I stand firm and secure on solid ground.
3: I express praise, inspiring others to trust and believe.
4: I trust in the divine and stay true to my values.
5: Your wonderful works and thoughts inspire my gratitude and awe.
6: I joyfully listen and respond to meaningful actions.
7: I embrace my purpose as written in life's story.
8: I joyfully follow my purpose with love in my heart.
9: I share truth boldly with others in unity.
10: I share my truth and kindness with everyone around me.
11: Your love and truth keep me safe every day.
12: I rise above challenges and find strength within myself.
13: I trust in your swift support and kindness.
14: I rise above those who wish me harm.
15: I rise above negativity and embrace my strength.
16: I joyfully celebrate the goodness of salvation.
17: The Lord cares for me and helps me in times of need.
